name: Couch Worms
description:
Couch Worms is a local coop/pvp game. To win you have to either steal the ball from the other worm 3 times, or kill the other worm.

There are only 2 worms, but a worm has two heads which can be controlled separately. So 2 players can share a worm.

From 2 to 4 players.
Recommended to use controllers, but one player can play on keyboard to suffer.
